pageTitle: D&A Bamboo Basket Weave Maxi Nursing Dress in Black & Beet by Japanese Weekend with free shipping
textBeforeTable: DESIGNER QUESTIONS REVIEWS (8) MORE INFO SIZING (8) Product Ratings: Now in gorgeous bamboo fabric! A combination of our favorite colors, royal and black, weave themselves together in this stunning Japanese Weekend Basket Weave Bamboo Maternity and Nursing Dress. Easy, cozy, and absolutely stunning to wear at any occasion and for any season. To nurse, pull the front panel to the side and nurse through the opening in the layer underneath. textAfterTable: View only items available in your size 92% Rayon from Bamboo, 8% Spndex Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Line dry. Made in USA Nursing access: Pull aside Approximate length from shoulder to hem: 56" I absolutely love this dress! It is both beautiful and comfortable and the lines are very flattering. I am 5'5" and the hem is just barely off the floor with 1 inch heels. It will be a perfect maternity dress.
